title: My Happy Marriage
overview: Miyo's abusive family deems her worthless – but together with her powerful husband-to-be, her true self and hidden powers slowly begin to shine.

tv.episodeTitle: Summer Cherry Blossoms, and the Mistake
tv.episodeOverview: Arata reveals his true identity and introduces Miyo to the grandfather she never knew. They claim they can cure her nightmares — on one condition.
